page.title: 02News in Illogan
page.content: Local news is covered by two main newspapers{'The West Briton & Royal {Cornwall Gazette'}Issued Thursdays price 16p page size 42cm * 60cm 54 pages approx{'The Camborne/Redruth {Packet'}Issued Thursdays price 18p page size 30cm * 44cm 36 pages approx. { NEWS ITEMS FROM JUNE 6th ISSUE: Cornwall's unemployment fell to{24,935 in May 1985.The Chairman of the Illogan Parish Council is{Mr.J.Mayne. {Kerrier Council}are planning to spend {Â£3000000}on housing.Illogan British Legion team won the{District Pool {League}and Illogan woman's football club finished second in{South_Western {League.}Two youths were charged with stealing{Â£50}and{two rings}from an old woman in Illogan.There is news about weddings and deaths and advertisements for discos,cars and concerts.
